bibl.title: William W. Tinkham and Annie Ll. Tinkham v. David E. Kimble and A.B. Corriell. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Justice Court of Mount Vernon Precinct County of Skagit, Territory of Washington

body.p: In the Justice Court of Mount Vernon Precinct County of Skagit Territory of Washington
Territory of Washington Plaintiff } Subpoena vs David E. Kimble + A.B. Coriel Defendants
Territory of Washington } s County of Skagit

To A. Hartson, Levi A. Ford, Rodney Sr, In the name of the United Blogith Sr. E.G. English, William Gage, Ocleary Sr., Mrs. Kimball, Mrs. Ocleary, Ida Kimball, Mrs Porter Mr H.P. Mobertone - Mr + Mrs Barrington

In the name of the United States you are hereby required to appear before the under signed Justices of the Peace in and for said County, on Friday the 2nd day of September AD 1887 at 2 oclock P.M. at his office in Mount Vernon to give evidence in a certain cause, then and there to be tried between the Territory of Washington, Plaintiff and D.E. Kimball, and A.B. Coriel Defendants, on the part of the Defendants-
Given under my hand this 1st day of September AD 1887
John T. Mason Justice of the Peace
In the Justice of the Court of Mt. Vernon Precinct County of Skagit Territory of Washington
Territory of Washington vs D.E. Kimball
D. Smith C.E. Attys for Defendants
I hereby certify such served the written subpoena on
A. Hartson Levi A Ford Ms. Blogit Sr. E G English William Gage Mr OCleary Sr Mrs OCleary Mr M Kimble Ida Kimble Mrs Porter Mrs Mobertone Mr + Mrs Barrington
On this 2nd day of September AD 1887 in Skagit County W.T
